Text: Equities analysts expect Aaron's to earn $4.48 per share next year, which means the company should continue to be able to cover its $0.14 annual dividend with an expected future payout ratio of 3.1%.
Cause: Equities analysts expect Aaron's to earn $4.48 per share next year
Effect: the company should continue to be able to cover its $0.14 annual dividend with an expected future payout ratio of 3.1%.
